revised_title: On the Formation and Properties of Peroxides of Organic Acids
tldr: The author investigates the formation of peroxides of organic radicals, specifically peroxides of benzoyl and acetyl, and their properties. These peroxides are prepared by reacting anhydrous acids or their corresponding chlorides with barium peroxide. The author describes the preparation process, properties, and analysis of these peroxides, and discusses potential future research directions.
